channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Today Family Worship
channel.desc: Like a plague, generations of people seem to be drifting uncontrollably into the sea of doubt, confusion, and lack of self-awareness. The enemy is hijacking the identity of young people everywhere. How can we combat this attack, and help lead our youth, young adults, and people of all ages to find their true identity and purpose in Christ? Join us for a powerful hour of reflection and discussion on this most relevant topic!
